thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ABN Amro Group Lodges Appeal Against Amsterdam Court Ruling From 19 December 2017‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ABN Amro Group Lodges Appeal Against Amsterdam Court Ruling From 19 December 2017‍​

organizations.name: brief-abn amro group lodges appeal against amsterdam court

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - ABN AMRO GROUP NV:
* HAS LODGED A SUPREME COURT APPEAL AGAINST THE RULING OF THE AMSTERDAM COURT ON 19 DECEMBER 2017‍​
* IN CO‘S VIEW, THE AMSTERDAM COURT HAS MISAPPLIED THE EUROPEAN COURT‘S TRANSPARENCY CRITERIA
* COURT‘S NEW RULING STATES PROVISIONS ON WHICH ABN AMRO BASED DECISION TO RAISE MARK-UP ARE UNFAIR AND SO INVALID‍​
* IN CO‘S VIEW, ITS ARGUMENTS FOR DECISION TO RAISE MARK-UP HAVE NOT BEEN CONSIDERED IN THE RULING‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
